data.text: @Yeliz30170546 We are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM and our colleagues already give you a response by email. Regards
@sarahlaclau HOla Sarah, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM. Regards
@martaahidalgo Hola Marta, hemos respondido a tu DM. Saludos
@mariajose_mh Hola Joselito, envíanos un mensaje directo https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6 con todos los detalles sobre lo sucedido y si hay algo en lo que podamos ayudarte desde aquí, déjanos saber. Saludos.
@lote_roro Hola. We have replied to your DM. Regards.

@ZakKilhoffer 1. Hola. We're sorry to read this. Since missing luggage is search separately, each one is taken as a single piece, identified with a PIR code that helps our colleagues to search and retrieve details regarding each piece.
@LouHugh94144201 Hola. We have replied to your DM. Regards.

@Fredrickland Hola, we are truly sorry to read about that. Could you please, send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with any detail you could consider important so that we could review your case? We remain at your disposal. Regards.
@RiMeLo86 Hola. We have replied to your DM. Regards.
@mr_boatshoes Hola, we have sent you more information on how to proceed in your case through our direct message conversation. Regards.
@martaahidalgo Hola Marta, te hemos enviado por MD el código con el cual podrás gestionar tu reserva a través de la web de Level. Déjanos saber por ese medio en caso de cualquier duda. Saludos.
@alisonvvort Hola Alison, we have sent a response to your direct message with more details about your query. Kind regards.

@LouHugh94144201 Hola, sorry to read this. According to the tracing system, it seems that one of the bags has been located, but the confirmation is still pending. The searches were never suspended. Once the bags have been located, you'll receive a SMS or email. Kind regards
@PrincessDuggan The only way to submit the claim is through the online form, as there isn't any email address for this purpose. We've sent you a new DM
@PrincessDuggan Hola, we've just sent you a DM with instructions on how to bypass the ''error message''. Please check
@slalani Hola, we're still waiting for an update from the claims department. Sorry for the delay

@KF_West Hola Kate, we're deeply sorry to read this and would like to offer our sincerest apologies. Could you please clarify which airline operated the flight? Please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and flight number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@eigensteve You're welcome, Steven. We remain at your disposal :)

@MajedNaji6 Hola Majed, sorry to read this. Did you request the unaccompanied minor service before the flight? Please send us a DM with your full name, booking code, ticket number (075...) and the passenger's names https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@ManiacMcCormill We are really sorry about the inconvenience, we will contact you as soon as we have any updates. Regards.
@ManiacMcCormill Unfortunately, at the moment, the airports are saturated and the agents are taking longer than usual to reply to our baggage center. We're deeply sorry

@ManiacMcCormill Hola, our baggage center sent several messages to RAK's airport, asking about your bag's delivery. However, the airport still hasn't replied. We appreciate your patience. Best regards
@BikeandBusLanes Sorry for the delay. We've just provided the ticket number via DM. Please check
@JaneN0tD0e Hola, we've just replied your DMs. Please check
@aleportz Hola, since your ticket was bought from Iberia Express (060 tickets), not Iberia (075 tickets), you must contact Iberia Express for further assistance https://t.co/UsQRNtkkn3 . Kind regards

urls.title: Customer service | Iberia Express
urls.description: Get to know how to contact our Customer Service for purchase, changes and refunds.

data.text: @1957RAB Indeed! Costa Rica is an amazing destination. We're glad to read that you enjoyed the trip and we can't wait to welcome you onboard once again :)
@helenbannigan Sorry for the inconvenience, Helen. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@theundercoverpr Hola. Sorry to read this. If you wish to appeal and have the case reviewed, you need to use the same online form https://t.co/pVVvyg1YzT. Select  ‘assistance’ as complaint reason, then use the text box to quote the original claim code and explain why you disagree. Kind regards

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @cheunghk5 Sorry, Cheung. The bag is only considered ''lost'' after 21 days of searches. We appreciate your patience
@ZakKilhoffer @andrelereveur Hola, we couldn't locate the DMs. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@DRinuti Hola Don, please send us the details by DM. Regards.
@TomasDeAlzaga_ Hola Tomas, sentimos los inconvenientes ocasionados, por motivos operativos, en ocasiones hay cambio de aeronave, facilítanos detalles por DM de tu reserva para poder revisar. Saludos
@conchwillow Hola, you can make a complaint in our site https://t.co/qlaQPQxXaG, from there our team will contact you directly. Regards.

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @flightbomb Hola, could you send us the details by DM? Thank you.

The Arenal Volcano National Park offers no less than 267 nature activities. 🌋 Find out more about Costa Rica here 👉 https://t.co/UrUxGD9gmx or in person. Can we take you there? https://t.co/cQ1amcXKWW

data.text: @elesmit Hola Roberto, te sugerimos intentar nuevamente desde un ordenador tras limpiar la caché y cookies de tu navegador web. En caso de que el problema persiste, por favor intenta usando otros navegadores web. Saludos.
@kadielicious Hola, sorry to read this. We're still waiting for an update from the claims department. We'll get back to you as soon as we have any news. Best regards

@ZakKilhoffer Hola Zak, please ask Eloise to contact us directly here on Twitter or on https://t.co/mY4B1tChDF , as we can only share information with the passenger that opened the PIR at the airport. You can ask her to send us the pictures from the bag and another from the bag tag

data.text: @cheunghk5 Hola Cheung, sorry for the inconvenience. Once the delivery process has been initiated, you'll receive a SMS or email with further details. We appreciate your patience

@rubenizuma Hola Ruben, sorry for the delay. Please delete the screenshot where we can see the claim reference number and send us the reference via DM along with your email address https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@LouHugh94144201 @BriDeehan Hola, we're deeply sorry. Could you send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number? https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@andrelereveur Please delete the PIR reference from your public tweet and send us the number via DM, along with your full name https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

data.text: @ZakKilhoffer It looks like that the agent didn't get the correct PIR reference or a similar bag was located yesterday, the call center agent thought it was yours, but the airport agents indicated that this isn't the case. Unfortunately, so far, there isn't any update about the bag's location
@Tony79091545 Hola Tony, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@ZakKilhoffer Sorry, Zak. There isn't any update about the bag being delivered to Illinois, unfortunately. So we really don't know how the agent gave you such info. We kindly ask you to please wait for an update via SMS or email. Best regards

data.text: @laurelmg23 Hola, we've just replied your DM. Please check

@lmagova According to the agreement between airlines, the airline that operates the last flight is the one responsible for the baggage delivery and its claim. If AA operated the last flight, you need to follow up with them. Kind regards
@ZakKilhoffer Hola, we've just replied your DMs. Sorry for the inconvenience

@lmagova We're sorry for the inconvenience. In order to assist you, we need a PIR reference number that belongs to us, Iberia, and not to American Airlines. Please send us a DM clarifying which airline operated the last flight in your itinerary https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@abbeynurton88 Hola Abbey. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, sorry for the inconvenience. We've just replied your DM about the replacement items. Please check
@cheunghk5 Hola, our team will contact you as soon as possible. Thank you.
@Sporthub365 Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@SimonDoubleday Hola Simon, we're glad to read that our colleague was able to assist you. We remain at your disposal. Kind regards
@hambobbean Hola, we've just replied your DM. Please check

@marinmedak We're deeply sorry for the delay, Marin. We've just replied the DMs
@British_Airways Thank you BA. Hola @hambobbean how we can help you? could you send us a DM.

data.text: @LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, in order to help you, we need you to share with us the report or PIR please.
@Yeliz30170546 Hola, in this case you should contact with Iberia Express directly to check the mentioned claim.  Thank you.
@Katya__maria Hola, we will reply to your DM. Thank you.
@hambobbean Hola, if your flight is operated by BA, you must contact them directly to check the availability for the upgrade. Regards.
@Yeliz30170546 Hola, could you send us all the details of the complaint and we will check this matter for you. Thank you.
@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, in order to follow your case, we need the report number and your complete name, could you send a DM with it? Thank you.
@LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, please send us the report information and your contact details by DM. Thank you.
@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana, sentimos no poder indicarte algo adicional de momento, el seguimiento puede hacerse online: https://t.co/APGKOhTARU ingresando con el PIR y el apellido. Saludos
@AnaMerinoPoeta Hola Ana, una vez presentado el reclamo formal, cualquier novedad con tu equipaje se indicaría vía sms/mail directamente en cuánto se localice y se programe el reparto. Saludos

@RiMeLo86 Hola Riaghnach, we inform you that the luggage search is in process, our colleagues will notify you of any news via SMS or email. Let us know by DM in case of any doubt. Regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text:
@lmagova Hola Luis, in previous messages we have indicated how to proceed. Let us know by DM in case of any doubt to review and assist you from this department. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@itsbitterbaby You may need to be at check-in time (between 24 and 2 hours before the flight) to do so. If the error persists please send us a direct message with all the details to review and assist you. Kind regards
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa 2/

@charmyers_ Hola Charlie, we are sorry to read your comments. Let us know by DM if there is anything we can assist you with from this department to review and tell you how to proceed. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@eigensteve Hola Steven, we would like to have more information about the incident. Did you initiate a claim at the airport? Do you have an associated PIR code? Let us know all the details by direct message to review. Kind regards.
https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@elissabflo Hola Elissa, we proceed to review your direct messages. Kind regards.
@mr_boatshoes Hola, we have answered your DM. Regards.
@LouHugh94144201 Hola, LouHugh94144201we answered to your direct message, we kindly ask you to keep the conversation on that channel, in order to have all the details in the same chat. Kind regards.
@asyncoder Hola Omar, did you get a PIR number (property irregularity report) at the airport? If so, could you send us a DM with the details and your full name, please? Regards.

@lauraleishman Hello Laura. Could you please provide us your booking code, ticker number ,and full name via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to verify from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@SheHateElliot Hola Elliot, we've just replied your DM. Please check
@godriver1 You're welcome.
@godriver1 Hola, sorry for the delay. We'll contact the claims department and get back to you via DM as soon as we have an update. Best regards

@EloisaC67013488 We're deeply sorry, Eloisa. The bag is only considered lost after 21 days of searches. As soon as it has been located, the passengers will receive an email or SMS with further details. Best regards
@winningworlds Probably there isn't availability. Please send us a DM with the exact flights and dates you are trying to book https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@CiaraDeehan @LouHugh94144201 Hola Lou, we're deeply sorry and have just replied your DM
@andiw_24 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@CiaraDeehan Hola Ciara, we're deeply sorry and have just replied your DM. Please ask the passenger that opened the PIR at the airport to contact us directly, as we can only share information with him/her. Kind regards
@TarrifaP Hola Tarrifa, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@raphaelbarone You're welcome :)

@winningworlds Hola, please clear all cookies from your browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device: https://t.co/m6fyDz8alC . Also, if you aren't searching flights to pay with Avios, make sure that the box ''pay with Avios'' isn't checked

@MariaBigPapa Hola Maria, sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your email address, booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
